1.title: Survivor Series 2016 Wrapup
1.plot: The third season begins with the crew discussing the inhumane beatdown that Goldberg gave to Brock Lesnar.

2.title: Roadblock End of the Line Wrapup
2.plot: It's the last time that we'll ever see this location, as the gang talks about matches involving three different kinds of weapons, plus a hole in AJ's tights.

3.title: The Best of 2016
3.plot: It's the best moments of the year. Join us on a journey through the last twelve months.

4.title: Raw #190
4.plot: We ring in the new year with a look at what is the lowest-rated Raw in television history, the 190th episode from December 23, 1996.

5.title: Royal Rumble 2017 Wrapup
5.plot: In a new location, the crew talks about the surprising Royal Rumble, and the not-so-surprising feuds coming out of it.

6.title: Elimination Chamber 2017 Wrapup
6.plot: Mike and Travis talk about Elimination Chamber, including a championship win that has been a long time coming.

7.title: Nitro #67
7.plot: This week, Mike takes a look at the December 23, 1996 episode of Monday Nitro, with not one, but two overbearing Hulk Hogan segments.

8.title: Fastlane 2017 Wrapup
8.plot: Mike and Travis (and Josh by phone) completely tear apart one of the worst PPV's they've ever laid eyes on. And they've seen December to Dismember.

9.title: XAWA ShOcK! #710
9.plot: The 2017 April Fools Day episode, featuring a review of the September 7, 2014 episode of XAWA's ShOcK.

1.title: WWE Raw No. 1070
1.plot: Mike takes a look at the November 25, 2013 edition of WWE Raw, featuring such matches as Xavier Woods vs. Heath Slater, CM Punk and Daniel Bryan vs. the Wyatt Family and more.

2.title: WWF SmackDown No. 3
2.plot: Mike takes a look at the third-ever episode of SmackDown from 1999, featuring a tag team match between Rock & Mankind and Triple H & Shane McMahon.

3.title: Battleground 2014 Wrapup
3.plot: Mike is joined by some friends to talk about WWE Battleground and its fallout.

4.title: SummerSlam 2014 Wrapup
4.plot: Mike is joined by Josh, Laura and a late-arriving Travis to talk about an inordinate number of German Suplexes.

5.title: Night of Champions 2014 Wrapup
5.plot: The gang gets together to talk Night of Champions, among other things.

6.title: Hell in a Cell 2014 Wrapup
6.plot: Mike is back with his friends to talk about Hell In a Cell 2014.

1.title: WWE Raw No. 1121
1.plot: Mike tackles the final Raw before Survivor Series, featuring guest star Grumpy Cat.

2.title: Survivor Series 2014 Wrapup
2.plot: Mike and the gang discuss the shocking debut of Sting in the WWE at Survivor Series.

3.title: Tables, Ladders, Chairs... And Stairs 2014 Wrapup
3.plot: The gang gets together to talk about badly photo-shopping "and Stairs" to the corner of the logo.

4.title: Royal Rumble 2015 Wrapup
4.plot: The gang gets together to discuss this year's Royal Rumble and where it all went wrong.

5.title: Fastlane 2015 Wrapup
5.plot: The crew takes a look at the show that was Fastlane, as well as discussing the latest NXT Takeover show and certain Seth Rollins photos.

6.title: XAWA LiveWire No. 1308
6.plot: The 2015 April Fools Day episode, featuring a review of XAWA's LiveWire from July of 2015.

7.title: WrestleMania 31 Wrapup
7.plot: It's the show of shows. Mike, Josh, Travis, Darren, Laura and Brad talk about the shocker of the night from WrestleMania 31, and a new World Champion.

8.title: Extreme Rules 2015 Wrapup
8.plot: The crew get together and discuss a night that didn't go too extreme enough.

9.title: Payback 2015 Wrapup
9.plot: The gang is together again, and did Payback live up to the hype? Plus, some surprises from the E.

10.title: NXT Unstoppable Wrapup
10.plot: The crew gets together to talk about NXT's latest offering, featuring a long-awaited debut.

11.title: Elimination Chamber 2015 Wrapup
11.plot: The crew locks it in to talk about the two chamber matches, one for a vacant title and the other, complete chaos.

12.title: Money in the Bank 2015 Wrapup
12.plot: The gang gets together to talk about the ladder match for the Money in the Bank contract and more.

13.title: Raw No. 1151 Wrapup
13.plot: Mike and Josh watch the June 15, 2015 edition of Raw, featuring Kevin Owens powerbombing MGK off of the stage.

14.title: Royal Rumble 1999 Retro Wrapup
14.plot: The crew gets together and invents a pay-per-view night, in order to watch the 1999 edition of the Royal Rumble.

15.title: Raw No. 1152 Wrapup
15.plot: Mike and Josh talk about Seth Rollins apologies on a lackluster Raw.

16.title: The Beast in the East 2015 Wrapup
16.plot: The crew gets together to talk about Brock Lesnar utterly destroying Kofi Kingston.

17.title: Raw No. 1154 Wrapup
17.plot: Brock Lesnar destroys a car and almost an audience member as Mike and Josh talk about the July 6 edition of Raw.

18.title: Raw No. 1155 Wrapup
18.plot: Mike and Josh are joined by a couple of friends for this wrap-up of the July 13, 2015 edition of Monday Night RAW.

19.title: Battleground 2015 Wrapup
19.plot: The crew celebrates one year of wrap-up shows by talking about Seth Rollins getting the snot beat out of him.

20.title: Raw No. 1156 Wrapup
20.plot: Mike and Josh talk about the fallout of WWE Battleground, and some really weird Christmas music

21.title: Raw No. 1157 Wrapup
21.plot: Mike and Josh discuss the July 27, 2015 edition of Monday Night RAW, followed by a discussion of Hulk Hogan's sudden dismissal from WWE.

22.title: Raw No. 1158 Wrapup
22.plot: Mike, Josh and Brad talk about Roddy Piper's legacy, Naomi's housewarming and Paige's boobies.

23.title: SummerSlam 2015 Wrapup
23.plot: Mike and Josh discuss Sting's surprise appearance and the return of the Dudley Boyz to the WWE.

24.title: SuperBrawl IX Retro Wrapup
24.plot: Mike and Josh take a trip back in time and review a WCW show for a change. This time, Hogan takes on Flair at SuperBrawl IX.

25.title: Raw No. 1162 Wrapup
25.plot: Mike and Josh talk about Divas beating the clock as well as Sting beating the Rollins.

26.title: The Best of Seasons 1 & 2
26.plot: It's time to take a journey back through the last year or so to look at some of the cast's favorite moments on the show.

27.title: Raw #1161 Wrapup
27.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Raw No. 1163 Wrapup
1.plot: With a jerk and a twist, Mike and Josh cover Sting destroying Seth Rollins' statue and much more.

2.title: Bash at the Beach 2000 Retro Wrapup
2.plot: Mike and Josh decide to be masochists and watch one of the worst wrestling shows of all time, the 2000 edition of "Bash at the Beach."

3.title: Raw No. 1164 Wrapup
3.plot: Mike and Josh take a look at the go-home show for Night of Champions, featuring Sting's first match on Monday Night RAW and some idiots dancing.

4.title: Night of Champions 2015 Wrapup
4.plot: The group is back together to talk about Night of Rollins featuring Sting and John Cena.

5.title: Raw No. 1166 Wrapup
5.plot: Mike and Josh talk about Kane fixing his broken ankle by stomping it, as well as Sean Waltman's pecs, Sunny's boobs and Lucha Underground.

6.title: Live from MSG 2015 Wrapup
6.plot: The crew gets together again to talk about the special WWE event from the world's most famous arena, starring the world's baddest ass and the world's biggest load.

7.title: Raw No. 1167 Wrapup
7.plot: Mike and Josh talk about Brock Lesnar tossing Big Show like a rag doll, and Seth Rollins tagging with Kane.

8.title: NXT TakeOver Respect Wrapup
8.plot: Mike and the crew discuss the latest NXT TakeOver special, featuring the debut of Asuka and the best women's match ever.

9.title: Raw No. 1168 Wrapup
9.plot: The crew talks briefly about the October 12, 2015 edition of Monday Night RAW.

10.title: Raw No. 1169 Wrapup
10.plot: Mike and Josh talk about the events of the October 19 edition of Raw.

11.title: Hell in a Cell 2015 Wrapup
11.plot: The gang is back together to talk about Undertaker and Brock Lesnar beating the crap out of each other.

12.title: Raw No. 1173 Wrapup
12.plot: Mike, Josh and Brad sit in a cramped room and pretty much spoil Survivor Series.

13.title: Survivor Series 2015 Wrapup
13.plot: The gang gets back together again for a show so predictable that it wasn't really worth watching.

14.title: Raw No. 1175 Wrapup
14.plot: Mike and Josh, with an off-screen Chris, talk about two of the worst Raws they've seen in a while.

15.title: Raw No. 1176 Wrapup
15.plot: Mike and Josh, with an off-screen Chris, tear apart another terrible edition of Monday Night Raw.

16.title: Tables, Ladders & Chairs 2015 Wrapup
16.plot: The gang gets back together to talk about Triple H getting the living hell beat out of him.

17.title: 2015 Slammy Awards Wrapup
17.plot: The crew gets together not only to talk about the special Raw, but to summarize the year in good and bad wrestling.

18.title: Raw No. 1179 Wrapup
18.plot: Mike and Josh talk about the final Raw of the year, featuring the mugshot of Vince McMahon.

19.title: Royal Rumble 2016 Wrapup
19.plot: While taking care of a drunk Josh, Mike and Travis talk about the Royal Rumble and how Phenomenal it was.

20.title: Fastlane 2016 Wrapup
20.plot: The gang is back together to talk about a pretty pointless super card, overall.

21.title: WrestleMania 32 Wrapup
21.plot: The crew gets together one last time to talk about the granddaddy of them all.

1.title: Battleground 2016 Wrapup
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Raw #1209 Wrapup
2.plot: Mike does his first unscripted solo Slam to give his thoughts about the new era of Raw, including thoughts on the new logo, the new set, the new look and feel, and the matches.

3.title: SmackDown #884 Wrapup
3.plot: Mike is joined by the cast of WrestleRiffs and MentalCast to discuss the first SmackDown of the new era, and whether or not it was better than Raw.

4.title: Raw #1210 Wrapup
4.plot: Mike is joined by Dane, Mark, Joseph and Adam to talk about the August 1 edition of Raw, and how much of a disappointment it was following last week's amazing show.

5.title: Raw #1212 Wrapup
5.plot: Mike is joined by Mark, Jace, Broseph and Aussie Adam to talk about the go-home Raw before SummerSlam.

6.title: SummerSlam 2016 Wrapup
6.plot: It's a rare Josh-less PPV wrap up, as Mike is joined only by Travis and Laura to talk about the biggest bloodbath of the summer.

7.title: Raw #1214 Wrapup
7.plot: Josh returns to talk about a Monday Night Raw with an amazing ending.

8.title: ECW Hardcore TV #1
8.plot: Mike takes a break from wrap up shows to bring us a review of the inaugural edition of ECW's Hardcore TV from 1993, which wasn't even hardcore back in those days.

9.title: Backlash 2016 Wrapup
9.plot: The crew is here, and they'll never forget this pay-per-view. What's it called again? Oh, yeah, Backlash.

10.title: Clash of Champions 2016 Wrapup
10.plot: Mike and Josh are here to talk about Raw's first solo PPV offering, Clash of Champions, and whether or not it was better than Backlash.

11.title: Monday Night Raw #11
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Bound for Glory 2016 Wrapup
12.plot: If you're a fan of TNA, you probably shouldn't watch this video. We torture ourselves with WCW Lite's biggest pay-per-view of the year, Bound For Glory.

13.title: WCW Monday Nitro #2
13.plot: This time around, Mike takes a look at the second-ever Nitro, featuring the main event of Hulk Hogan defending the WCW title against Lex Luger.

14.title: No Mercy 2016 Wrapup
14.plot: What happens when you start the show with the main event? You get No Mercy, as discussed by Mike, Josh and Travis.

15.title: Hell in a Cell 2016 Wrapup
15.plot: History is made twice as the Women's Championship is both main event and inside a Hell in a Cell. Was it any good?

16.title: TNA Asylum Years #101
16.plot: Mike finally takes a look at the very first TNA program, the weekly pay-per-view event from June 19, 2002 that kicked off a decade and a half of pointing and laughing.

-1.title: TLC 2016 Wrapup
-1.plot: It's the last time that we'll ever see this location, as the gang talks about matches involving three different kinds of weapons, plus a hole in AJ's tights.
